instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-2914 No image
threads.message:
Clean board, we replaced the GPU with new one

Chime sounds, external HD hast activity and caps lock key sometimes turns green when pressed after start up chime, but no image and no backlight at all.

threads.title: 820-2914 No image
threads.message: Not sure since it was sent here with not GPU other shop did not have it so we just installed a new one but no image

threads.title: 820-2914 No image
threads.message:
Do you have external video?
Possibly knocked off component, or bad GPU.
I doubt you can find "real new" chip nowadays.
Also compare diode mode to ground on all series caps between GPU and CPU; page 74, on the GPU side.

threads.title: 820-2914 No image
threads.message: No external video on this one
